tool_description: This API helps to query for live cricket scores, commentary, latest cricket news and editorials, schedules of upcoming matches, rankings, stats, records, etc
title: Cricbuzz Cricket

api_list.name: matches/get-commentaries

required_parameters.name: matchId
required_parameters.description: The value of matchId field returned in …/matches/list, …/schedules/list, …/series/get-matches, …/teams/get-schedules, …/teams/get-results, …/venues/get-matches endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: tms
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, leave empty to load the first page, or an Epoch timestamp value in milliseconds (Ex : 1640883600000) to load the next page. You are interested in the 'timestamp' field returned right in this endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: iid
optional_parameters.description: innings Id (Ex : 1)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricbuzz-cricket.p.rapidapi.com/mcenter/v1/{matchid}/comm"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricbuzz-cricket.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: stats/get-icc-rankings

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : `batsmen`|`bowlers`|`allrounders`|`teams`

required_parameters.name: formatType
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : test|odi|t20 (if isWomen parameter is 1, there will be no odi)

optional_parameters.name: isWomen
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 to get rankings for women

appIndex.seoTitle: ICC Cricket Rankings - Top 100 Batsmen | Cricbuzz.com

api_list.name: stats/get-records

required_parameters.name: statsType
required_parameters.description: The value of 'value' field returned in …/stats/get-record-filters endpoint

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description: Specify year to get records. Ex : 2021

optional_parameters.name: opponent
optional_parameters.description: The value of teamId field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: The value of teamId field returned right in this endpoint

optional_parameters.name: matchType
optional_parameters.description: The value of matchTypeId field returned right in this endpoint

appIndex.seoTitle: Live cricket scores, schedule, news, archive, series | Cricbuzz.com

api_list.name: stats/get-icc-standings

required_parameters.name: matchType
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : `1`-World test championship|`2`-World cup super league

optional_parameters.name: seasonId
optional_parameters.description: The value of seasonStandings/id field returned right in this endpoint

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricbuzz-cricket.p.rapidapi.com/stats/v1/iccstanding/team/matchtype/{matchtype}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricbuzz-cricket.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

body.subText: In the WTC 2021-2023, teams will get 12 points for a win, 4 for a draw and 6 for a tie. Points percentage system (PCT) will be used to determine the leaderboard. PCT = Points won by a team / Points contested * 100.

story.hline: World Cup factfile - The journey of the Women's WC
story.intro: From the first edition of the tournament in 1973 to the latest one in 2017 - here's how the tournament has traversed over the years
story.seoHeadline: ICC Womens World Cup 2022: World Cup factfile - The journey of the Women's WC

coverImage.caption: One of the biggest positives from the 2017 WC in England was that the popularity of the game grew exponentially with an estimated 180 million watching the tournament.

story.hline: Bangladesh top-order frustrates New Zealand in attritional session
story.intro: In response to New Zealand's 328, Bangladesh went to Tea break on 70/1
story.seoHeadline: Bangladesh top-order frustrates New Zealand in attritional session

coverImage.caption: Mahmudul Hasan Joy and Shadman Islam started well against New Zealand

story.hline: CPL 2021: Team of the tournament
story.intro: Four players from Trinbago Knight Riders and three from Guyana Amazon Warriors make it to the XI
story.seoHeadline: CPL 2021: Team of the tournament, Evin Lewis, Ravi Rampaul

coverImage.caption: No one has scored more runs or hit more sixes than Evin Lewis in CPL 2021

story.hline: Tatiele de Carvalho - From men's clothes to Women's Cricket
story.intro: The finalist at the Rio 2016 Olympics, has promised to improve Brazil's history-making female cricketers ahead of this year's World Cup qualifiers against USA, Canada, Argentina
story.seoHeadline: Tatiele de Carvalho - From men's clothes to Women's Cricket

coverImage.caption: "She may not be in the same sport, but she has done exactly what these girls want to do — reach the top of their game," says Matt Featherstone, head coach of Brazil Women.  Pic credit: Cricket Brazil

story.hline: England's rotation policy: A move anchored in flexibility and pragmatism
story.intro: Touring in the times of Covid and bio-bubbles has forced ECB's hand into thinking out of the box, even if it costs England a chance to play their best XIs
story.seoHeadline: England's rotation policy: A move anchored in flexibility and pragmatism

coverImage.caption: Bairstow, who's made a promising return to Test cricket, won't start the India series.

story.hline: RCB release Finch, Morris; KXIP let go of Maxwell
story.intro: Sanju Samson to captain Rajasthan Royals, who've let go of Steve Smith. CSK hold on to Raina
story.seoHeadline: RCB release Aaron Finch, Chris Morris and Moeen Ali

coverImage.caption: Glenn Maxwell's release adds INR 10.75 crores to KXIP's purse.

story.hline: Out of Newlands' emptiness comes cricket
story.intro: Even in a comparatively small ground - Newlands's capacity is only 25,000 - the desolation was palpable
story.seoHeadline: Out of Newlands' emptiness comes cricket

coverImage.caption: After a break of 265 days, South Africa were back on the field

story.hline: The best of Suresh Raina
story.intro: Here are some of the Indian southpaw's finest innings in international cricket
story.seoHeadline: The best of Suresh Raina international cricket innings

coverImage.caption: Suresh Raina represented India in 322 international matches

story.hline: MS Dhoni's top ODI knocks
story.intro: Here are the top ten One-Day International innings played by Mahendra Singh Dhoni
story.seoHeadline: MS Dhoni's top ODI knocks

coverImage.caption: Dhoni made a sensational 91* in Mumbai to help India win the 2011 World Cup

story.hline: The extraordinary life of Sir Everton Weekes
story.intro: The last of the famous Three W's of West Indies cricket passed away on Thursday at the age of 95
story.seoHeadline: The extraordinary life of Sir Everton Weekes

coverImage.caption: Sir Everton Weekes's zest for life, his ability to laugh at himself and the insatiable enthusiasm to keep facing every challenge with a smile and a laugh had everyone around him in awe

appIndex.seoTitle: Latest and breaking Cricket News - Cricbuzz | Cricbuzz.com

api_list.name: news/list-by-topic

required_parameters.name: topicId
required_parameters.description: Filter news by topic, the value of id field returned in …/news/get-topics

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricbuzz-cricket.p.rapidapi.com/news/v1/topics/{topicid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricbuzz-cricket.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

story.hline: Kohli, Rohit, and a multilayered decision shaping Indian cricket
story.intro: Unravelling the variety of thoughts within BCCI that led to the removal of Virat Kohli as the ODI captain
story.seoHeadline: Kohli, Rohit, and a multilayered decision shaping Indian cricket

coverImage.caption: Rohit Sharma has replaced Virat Kohli as India's white-ball captain

story.hline: How Pakistan's darkest hour gave birth to the age of Babar
story.intro: When New Zealand pulled out of a tour in September, Pakistan's players were devastated. Yet the emotion has been channelled into a momentous T20 World Cup campaign, with Babar Azam proving an authoritative new leader
story.seoHeadline: How Pakistan's darkest hour gave birth to the age of Babar

coverImage.caption: "If Babar says, it's night, we will believe that as well. No questions asked"

story.hline: What went wrong in IPL 2021
story.intro: The inside story of how the tournament fell apart midway through the season
story.seoHeadline: What went wrong in IPL 2021, Amit Mishra, Tim Seifert, Prasidh Krishna

coverImage.caption: IPL 2021 was suspended indefinitely following a rise in cases of COVID-19 within the bio bubble.

appIndex.seoTitle: Cricket's latest, important issues - Cricbuzz | Cricbuzz.com

story.hline: The contrasting worlds of Rohit and Rahul
story.intro: Where the LSG skipper and his side are enjoying a fine run of form, Rohit and the Mumbai Indians continue to search for a chasm of light amid the gloom
story.seoHeadline: The contrasting worlds of Rohit and Rahul

coverImage.caption: Mumbai Indians are winless in eight games this season.

story.hline: KL Rahul's love affair with MI continues
story.intro: The Lucknow Super Giants skipper scored more than 60% of his team's total as MI lost their eighth straight game
story.seoHeadline: KL Rahul's love affair with MI continues

coverImage.caption: Rahul has scored hundreds in both games now against Mumbai Indians this season.

story.hline: Can Rahul and LSG begin their new journey with a bang?
story.intro: The IPL debutants are a team stacked with all-rounders, backed up by quality batting line-up and plenty of fire in the bowling
story.seoHeadline: Can Rahul and LSG begin their new journey with a bang?

coverImage.caption: Apart from Rahul, the Super Giants picked Marcus Stoinis and Ravi Bishnoi as their other two pre-auction buys.

story.hline: Rahul, Axar ruled out of T20I series against West Indies
story.intro: Ruturaj Gaikwad and Deepak Hooda have been named replacements for the upcoming three-match series
story.seoHeadline: Rahul, Axar ruled out of T20I series against West Indies

coverImage.caption: KL Rahul and Axar Patel have been ruled out of the T20I series against West Indies

story.hline: KL Rahul signed by Lucknow franchise for INR 17 crores
story.intro: Rahul will captain the team, that has also signed Marcus Stoinis (INR 9.2 crores) and Ravi Bishnoi (INR 4 crores)
story.seoHeadline: KL Rahul signed by Lucknow franchise for INR 17 crores

coverImage.caption: KL Rahul and Ravi Bishnoi, teammates at Punjab Kings, will be part of the Lucknow franchise.

story.hline: Pant-Rahul century stand, Thakur's 40* help India to 287
story.intro: Pant and Rahul struck half-centuries but it required a cameo from Thakur to help India post a challenging total
story.seoHeadline: Pant-Rahul century stand, Thakur's 40* help India to 287

coverImage.caption: Shardul Thakur struck an unbeaten 40 off 38 balls

story.hline: Rahul named captain for South Africa ODIs; Ashwin returns
story.intro: Regular ODI captain Rohit, Jadeja and Axar unavailable due to respective injuries; Shami rested
story.seoHeadline: Rahul named captain for South Africa ODIs; Ashwin returns

coverImage.caption: Rahul was earlier named Test vice-captain in Rohit's absence.

story.hline: Enjoying leaving balls outside off stump: Rahul
story.intro: The Indian opener batted in excess of six hours across two days to lay the foundation stone for India's win at Centurion
story.seoHeadline: Enjoying leaving balls outside off stump: KL Rahul, India cricket tour of South Africa, 2021-22

coverImage.caption: The seeds of India's 1-0 lead and a big step towards a historic series victory were sown by the first innings batting effort, led admirably by Rahul

story.hline: India stretch lead past 200 in slow-moving session
story.intro: The visitors lost two wickets for only 63 runs in the morning session
story.seoHeadline: India stretch lead past 200 in slow-moving session

coverImage.caption: Virat Kohli was unbeaten at Lunch along with Cheteshwar Pujara

story.hline: Rahul, Mayank see out early Centurion intrigue
story.intro: The Indian openers dealt with the challenges of the conditions in the morning session to pave the way for a day of dominance
story.seoHeadline: Rahul, Mayank see out early Centurion intrigue, India cricket tour of South Africa, 2021-22

coverImage.caption: A 117-run opening stand provided the platform for India to take the Day 1 honours

appIndex.seoTitle: KL Rahul latest and breaking cricket news - Cricbuzz | Cricbuzz.com

Hardik and Saha revived Gujarat Titans.
Hardik brought up his 3rd successive fifty.
However, KKR fought back hard at the death as Russell picked up four wickets in the final over.
Shami removed the KKR openers in the chase.
Titans kept chipping away to put KKR under pressure.
It was a one-man show as Russell kept his side in the hunt.
However, Titans managed to get rid of him in the final over to seal the deal.

body.headline: Abdur Razzak to serve short coaching stint at High Performance Unit

coverImage.caption: Razzak (black top) will serve as a temporary spin consultant at HP camp.

content.contentValue: Abdur Razzak, member of Bangladesh's selection panel, will have a short stint with the High Performance Unit as spin consultant during their upcoming camp, scheduled to start from May 14.
The experienced left-arm spinner joined the @L0$ on June 27 last year after retiring from all forms of cricket but this will be his stint in a coaching capacity.

"Yes, I will be joining the HP camp if everything goes according to plan," Razzak told Cricbuzz on Monday. "It is not that I am shifting my focus on coaching at the moment but what I feel is that I have got lot of experience that I can share with the young boys and if they benefit by it that will be extremely satisfying. I think it will be an exciting experience for me as well," he added.

Naimur Rahman, Bangladesh Cricket Board's High Performance Unit chairman, told Cricbuzz that they have approached Razzak as they are unable to rope any foreign spin consultant at the moment. "We are yet to get any good spin coach or consultant for our High Performance Unit and so we are eyeing to include Razzak in the HP camp as we are all aware he can share the experience with our boys," said Naimur.
"I am sure if he can manage his time he will do a great job and his guidance will certainly help the boys develop their skill."

Cricbuzz understands that BCB is also planning to use national team's batting coach Jamie Siddons in the HP camp if he is available. HP Unit head coach Toby Radford, who is expected to arrive in Dhaka on June 1, will be overseeing the development of the batsmen while Champaka Ramanayke will be at helm of the pace bowling unit.

appIndex.seoTitle: Abdur Razzak to serve short coaching stint at High Performance Unit  | Cricbuzz.com

body.intro: BCB are yet to find a foreign spin consultant for their high performance unit

body.name: Usman Khawaja
body.teams: Australia, New South Wales, Derbyshire, Cricket Australia Chairmans XI, Sydney Thunder, Queensland, Australians, Australia A, Lancashire, Rising Pune Supergiant, Glamorgan, Islamabad United
body.bio:
Ricky Ponting's injury at Sydney in 2011, opened the doors for the first Muslim cricketer to represent Australia at the highest level. A qualified pilot, the highs of this achievement were unparalleled. Having moved to Australia as a kid, Usman Khawaja with the bat in his hands was identified pretty early as the boy wonder.

Honing his skills at the Valley District Cricket Club, Usman made it to the Australian under-19 squad for the 2006 World Cup. He featured in 4 games and hunted down 140 runs making an impression with his poise at the crease and crafty technique. A backlift which comes down on the ball like butter on bread, Khawaja loves to cut and pull.

Following his debut series, Usman travelled to Sri Lanka and South Africa without much of a success. The year of 2011 ended with a home series against the Kiwis and that also remained a low key affair for the then New batsman.

He was dropped post that and his next tryst with the baggy green happened during the Ashes in England in 2013 after a layoff of almost 18 months. In 3 Tests, he managed only fifty and another exile from Test cricket was handed out.

In the meanwhile, Usman had made his ODI debut at the beginning of 2013 and met a similar fate as he was dropped after three unsuccessful outings in colored clothing. Another big move that Usman had made was the move from NSW to Queensland in 2012.

His debut season at Queensland yielded 438 runs from 6 games and it got better in the succeeding season as he riled up 551 runs at an average of 50.09 in 8 games. But then occurred a career-threatening injury. He tore his ACL (Anterior Cruciate Ligament) on his left knee and was out of cricket for the next 9 months.

Khawaja who was now aware and accustomed to the waiting game built on his patience on the sidelines. He returned to the 2015-16 season with a bang. A ton on his return game for Sydney Thunder in December 2015 made the world aware of the destruction that he can be. The T20I debut was just a mere formal announcement when the touring Indians whitewashed Australia 0-3.

All this was just before his Test comeback. Usman went onto become a permanent member of the Test team post that barring the tour to India for which he was dropped unceremoniously. But he returned for the Ashes 2017-18 and scored vital knocks over the course of the series. His couple of tons in BBL 05 ensured Sydney Thunder, the constant wooden Spooner shocked the cricketing fraternity and ended up winning the title.

With the bans of Steve Smith and David Warner in 2018, Khawaja was thrust with the responsibility of being Australia's premier batsman in Tests and he rose to the responsibility with elan. A marathon match-saving knock in UAE was the start of a dream run for the stylish left-hander who also stamped his class during the limited-overs tour of India in 2019.

His prolific run in that ODI series and the succeeding one against Pakistan in the UAE helped Khawaja book his maiden World Cup call-up.

Interesting facts: Apart from being a professional cricketer, Khawaja is also a qualified pilot.

Usman is an ex-student of Westfields Sports School, which has also produced sportsmen of the calibre of Michael Clarke (former Australia captain), soccer player Harry Kewell and world champion discus thrower Dani Samuels.

World Cup through the years
Khawaja is all set to play his first World Cup with the 2019 edition. He was still blooming back in 2015 and not surprisingly, didn’t make the cut then. Even this time, he may not have made it to the squad if not for the 2018-19 season when he was recalled to the ODI side in the absence of Steve Smith and David Warner. However, with the duo now back, Khawaja’s batting position for the World Cup will be interesting, given that his runs came as an opener. He’s unlikely to get that spot now and might possibly be the no.3 bat for the side with Smith at four.

By Cricbuzz Staff

appIndex.seoTitle: Usman Khawaja Profile - Cricbuzz | Cricbuzz.com

story.hline: IPL playoffs to be played in Kolkata, Ahmedabad
story.intro: Meanwhile, Lucknow will host a three-team Women's T20 Challenge while the venues for South Africa's five-match tour of India has also been announced
story.seoHeadline: IPL playoffs to be played in Kolkata, Ahmedabad

coverImage.caption: IPL 2022 final will be played in Ahmedabad

story.hline: 'Would have loved to have handled the Kumble issue hundred times differently'
story.intro: Vinod Rai, who ran the BCCI as the head of the SC-appointed Committee of Administrators, admitted that he would have stuck with Kumble as India's head coach if his contract had an extension clause
story.seoHeadline: 'Would have loved to have handled the Kumble issue hundred times differently'

coverImage.caption: Anil Kumble had stepped down as India head coach following the Champions Trophy 2017

story.hline: India set to play two T20Is vs WI in US
story.intro: The fixtures, scheduled in Florida, is expected to be played in August
story.seoHeadline: India to play two T20Is vs WI in US in August

coverImage.caption: The games in the US will be the last two of the eight-match series

story.hline: One final bidding war after IPL TV and OTT rights sold
story.intro: Cricbuzz understands that in the Invitation to Tender, provisions are made for the winners of the TV rights to challenge the digital rights holders setting off one final round of e-bidding
story.seoHeadline: One final bidding war after IPL TV and OTT rights sold

coverImage.caption: "The ITT has been devised and packaged in such a way that it gives opportunities to the smaller players."

story.hline: MS Dhoni - Decoding the Midas Touch
story.intro: MS Dhoni is India's most decorated captain, despite the fact that he rarely had the best team in the competitions he won. Prasanna Agoram explains how Dhoni was able to marshall his resources so effectively, and transform the fortunes of individual players
story.seoHeadline: MS Dhoni - Decoding the Midas Touch

coverImage.caption: MS Dhoni is India's most decorated captain, despite the fact that he rarely had the best team in the competitions he won

story.hline: Bengaluru pitch for IND-SL Test rated below average by ICC
story.intro: "It wasn't an even contest between bat and ball," wrote ICC match referee Javagal Srinath in his report
story.seoHeadline: Bengaluru pitch for IND-SL Test rated below average by ICC

coverImage.caption: "The pitch offered a lot of turn on the first day itself and though it improved with every session, in my view, it was not an even contest between bat and ball."

story.hline: Takeaways: Pant levels up and Iyer crushes spin
story.intro: What we learnt from India's 2-0 Test series win over Sri Lanka
story.seoHeadline: Takeaways: Pant levels up and Iyer crushes spin

coverImage.caption: Rishabh Pant has evolved into a valuable sounding board for his captain and other senior senior members of the team

story.hline: Karunaratne takes alternative route to his hundred
story.intro: On a surface that had sting, bounce, turn and surprise, the Sri Lankan captain produced an innings of calm, of restraint and of assured attack
story.seoHeadline: Dimuth Karunaratne takes alternative route to his hundred, Sri Lanka cricket

coverImage.caption: It was Karunaratne's seventh ton in Tests since 2018 to go with 13 fifties and an average of 47.07

story.hline: India cruise to 2-0 series win
story.intro: India cruised to a comprehensive win in Bengaluru outplaying Sri Lanka for a 238-run victory to win the pink-ball Test and seal the series 2-0
story.seoHeadline: India cruise to 2-0 series win, Sri Lanka cricket

coverImage.caption: India cruised to a comprehensive win in Bengaluru outplaying Sri Lanka for a 238-run victory to win the pink-ball Test and seal the series 2-0

story.hline: India in command despite Mendis, Karunaratne fifties
story.intro: Sri Lanka were 151 for 4 at Tea on Day 3 of the second Test, still needing 296 more for victory
story.seoHeadline: India in command despite Mendis, Karunaratne fifties

coverImage.caption: R Ashwin crossed Dale Steyn's Test tally with 440 wickets
